page.title: 17Occupation of Parents-Kirton
page.content: We asked all the children in our school to fill in a questionnaire about the work that their parents do. We found out that 18% of the fathers are unemployed and 50% of mothers go out to work. 26% of fathers and 52% of mothers actually work in or near Kirton, while 34% of both mothers and fathers work in the local town of Boston.The other parents work elsewhere in the area. About 15% of fathers and 26% of mothers work on or actually run farms. About 12% of fathers are lorry drivers and a few people are employed in packing vegetables.About 7% of fathers are professional people - a soliciter, doctors, nurses , a policeman and several teachers.
